name: refrigerate

effect.sun_moon: Turns the bearer's normal-type moves into ice-type moves. Moves changed by this ability have 1.3× their power.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Turns the bearer's normal-type moves into ice-type moves. Moves changed by this ability have 1.3× their power.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Turns the bearer's normal-type moves into ice-type moves. Moves changed by this ability have 1.3× their power.

short_effect: Turns the bearer's normal moves into ice moves and strengthens them to 1.3× their power.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
